basics.name: Cody Johnson
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am sttudying for my Associates in Information Technology at Sullivan University in Louiville Kentucky. I expect to graduate in March of 2025.

work.summary: Perform customer service by checking out customers and providing information on products in the department while also stocking and managing inventory.
highlights: Providing assistance regarding technological questions and other customer issues.

volunteer.summary: Lead and worked on numerous projects benefiting my local community
highlights: Served in Senior Patrol leader position for at least 6 months
Lead a Church of the Heartland playrgound redevelopment project

awards.title: Eagle Scout
awards.summary: Highest rank obtainable in Scouting for obtaining 21 merit badges including all Eagle Scout required badges needed, 6 months of leadership as the Life Scout Rank, completion of an Eagle Scout project, and being judged by a board of review.
